body_html:
I am unable to reproduce this error with the information you provided.
When I sync to e895d5c, the configure script works fine for me.
At what point is it failing? the error messages seem to be coming from bazel?

Could you please capture what responses you provided to the ./configure script and all the command lines you typed.

Also, could you please check that you installed all required dependencies as described in this page:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources

body:
I am unable to reproduce this error with the information you provided.
When I sync to e895d5c, the configure script works fine for me.  
At what point is it failing?  the error messages seem to be coming from bazel?
